summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 6%) and rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 993 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 497.6m higher than yesterday, 386.7m lower than the past week, 992.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1763.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2150m and 2760m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Showers, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Changeable conditions.
